org.cove.jade.composites
Class SpringBox

    java.lang.Object
    org.cove.jade.composites.SpringBox
public class SpringBox
extends java.lang.Object

Class implementing a sprung box. This is a box consisting of 4 corner primitive particles, each linked to the other by spring constraints. 

    JADE - JAva Dynamics Engine
    Release 0.6.1 alpha 2005-12-28
    SpringBox class
